casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
Robert Wayne PRUESNER, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 158524
COA: 337576 Supreme Court of Michigan. October 19, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellee to extend the time for filing his answer to the application for leave to appeal is GRANTED. The answer will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before November 27, 2018.
